plot: A divorced father and his resentful daughter share a transcendent moment of understanding when she comes to visit him on the pretext of needing money to take a self defence course.
title: Left Turn
plot_es: A divorced father and his resentful daughter share a transcendent moment of understanding when she comes to visit him on the pretext of needing money to take a self defence course.
plot_en: A divorced father and his resentful daughter share a transcendent moment of understanding when she comes to visit him on the pretext of needing money to take a self defence course.
